name: Friction Privacy Policy
body:
### Welcome!

# Terms

* The program can send only users nickname and the country name (this information is optional filled by user).

* Stored information is used only for generating a unique identifier of player.

* Only user can send his nickname and country name (the program can not get this information by itself). For it user need to click on button "Refresh the result".

* The program does not need your passwords, mailboxes or other personal information.

* Developers are not responsible for data losing due to natural disasters or malicious actions.

* You can play using only local user. In this case, you will be missing in the overall results table.



If you have any questions, please contact us at timaxoxa@meta.ua


**Timaxoxa, 2014**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
